= Derivation =

| $f(x)$              | $f'(x)$                          |            |
|---------------------|----------------------------------|------------|
| $x^n $              | $nx^{n-1}$                       | $n \neq 0$ |
| $\mathrm{sin}(ax)$  | $a\;\mathrm{cos}(ax)$            |            |
| $\mathrm{cos}(ax)$  | $-a\;\mathrm{sin}(ax)$           |            |
| $\mathrm{tan}(ax)$  | $\frac{a}{\mathrm{cos}^2(ax)}$   |            |
| $e^x$               | $e^x$                            |            |
| $a^x$               | $(\mathrm{ln}\; a)a^x$           |            |
| $\mathrm{ln}\;x$    | $\frac{1}{x}$                    |            |
| $\mathrm{ln}\;f(x)$ | $\frac{f'(x)}{f(x)}$             |            |
| $\mathrm{log}_a\,x$ | $\frac{1}{(\mathrm{ln}\; a)\,x}$ |            |

= Integration =

| $f(x)$             | $\int f(x)\,dx$                                     |             |
|--------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|-------------|
| $x^n$              | $\frac{x^{n+1}}{n+1}$                               | $n \neq -1$ |
| $x^{-1}$           | $\mathrm{ln}\;\lvert x \rvert$                      |             |
| $\mathrm{ln}\;x$   | $x\;\mathrm{ln}\;x - x$                             |             |
| $\mathrm{sin}(ax)$ | $-\frac{\mathrm{cos}(ax)}{a}$                       |             |
| $\mathrm{cos}(ax)$ | $\frac{\mathrm{sin}(ax)}{a}$                        |             |
| $\mathrm{tan}(ax)$ | $\frac{\mathrm{ln}\lvert\mathrm{cos}(ax)\rvert}{a}$ |             |


= Trigonometry =

== Exact values ==

| Radians         | Degrees | sin                  | cos                  |
|-----------------|---------|----------------------|----------------------|
| 0               | 0       | 0                    | 1                    |
| $\frac{\pi}{6}$ | 30      | $\frac{1}{2}$        | $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$ |
| $\frac{\pi}{4}$ | 45      | $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$ | $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$ |
| $\frac{\pi}{3}$ | 60      | $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$ | $\frac{1}{2}$        |
| $\frac{\pi}{2}$ | 90      | 1                    | 0                    |

== Identities ==

$\mathrm{sec}\;x = \frac{1}{\mathrm{cos}\;x}$
